review_details: Hervorragende K√ºche, sympathischer und kompetenter Service, professionelle Weinempfehlung, gem√ºtlich, entspannte Atmosph√§re! Wir sind begeistert und kommen jederzeit gerne wieder hierher.

Thank you Mirco from Svalbard Wildlife Expedition for the great tour yesterday! Thanks for all the interesting information about animals, nature, life at Longyearbyen, the glaciers and how to survive in the cold. Thanks for individualizing the tour for us, being calming, motivating, patient and reliable.
We loved it.
Eva & Martin

We went on a boat tour with Andreas and Marios and it was just great in any way.
We enjoyed it so much that we booked another tour just the day after.
We saw how the fishing works and had a few good catches.
We went snorkeling and swimming at hidden beaches and bays that can only be found by boat.
We ate fresh prepared fish, fruits and vegetables from the guides own garden, got drinks and information as much as we wanted.
Andreas and Marios did everything to individualize the journey for us and stopped at the beaches we asked them to.

We recommend this boat tour for couples and families. The guides are caring and very hospitable.

THANK YOU, Andreas and Marios!
